document_data.caption: A map showing Fields Lane in northwest Daggerford.
document_data.name: Fields Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Fields Lane''' was a small road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Fields Lane was located in the northwest section of Daggerford. It branched south from [[Wall Street (Daggerford)|Wall Street]] near the [[Farmer's Gate]] and terminated at Daggerford's market. [[Horse Way]] connected with Fields Lane's northern stretch.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along Fields Lane included:

* The [[Dragonback Inn]]
